item.description:
Dear Sangha and Friends,

I received this message from the director of overseas propagation in Japan.

Kanshin Mochida

Tomorrow, volunteer Nichiren followers will observe the first-seventh day memorial prayers for the victims of the North Japan earthquake at 14:46, Japan time in temples. If possible, I would like to ask everyone to take a brief moment at that time and share the time of prayer for all the victims of not only that earthquake but also of all the disasters in world with us.

 

This will be in the middle of the night in our time zone but we would like to add our prayers also. Tonight is the Shodaigyo scheduled at the Temple in Haverhill. We will do a memorial tonight and say prayers for the 7 day. If you can please join us. 

 

I will be going to North Carolina this weekend so no service is scheduled this weekend.

with Gassho,

Ryuoh Shonin
item.why: We usually do Shodaigyo at the Temple on Wednesday but will be doing a service for the Victims in Japan. Please see the Additional Details below.
item.name: Memorial Service for the Victims of the Tsunami in Japan
